org.switchyard.component.http.composer

Class HttpBindingData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.switchyard.component.http.composer.HttpBindingData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpRequestBindingData, HttpResponseBindingData

    public abstract class HttpBindingData
extends Object
implements BindingData
    HTTP binding data that wraps the headers and body.
    Author:
    Magesh Kumar B © 2012 Red Hat Inc.
